title: Maximum Product of Three Numbers (Hard)
description:
Given a list of 3 integers, find the maximum product of three numbers. Note that each number can be used only once.
#### Function Signature
```python
def max_product(nums: List[int]) -> int:
``` 
#### Input
- `nums` (List[int]): A list of 3 integers.
#### Output
- Returns the maximum product of three numbers from the input list.
